show.title: Ranching Reboot
show.summary: Rebooting your thinking about Farming, Ranching and Food production. Conversations in land stewardship with some of today's most innovative ranchers and producers. Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/ranching-reboot/support

title: #65 Brett Kenzy "Meet us at the Ranch Gate"
subtitle: #65 Brett Kenzy "Meet us at the Ranch Gate"
summary:
Newly elected R-Calf President Brett Kenzy joined me on Zoom to talk about what the organizations priorities are for the foreseeable future.
We talk about what R-Calf is doing for every cattleman and Brett lays out several ways that you can get involved.
We spend plenty of time unpacking MCool, 50/14, the contract library and the Fisher/Grassly Bill

www.R-Calfusa.com

www.LabelOurBeef.com

Packers and Stockyards Report / Washington Center Study

Studies Supporting the 50/14 Bill

Call the Congressional Switchboard and find your reps:
202-224-3121
